tool_description: Evaluates fulfillment performance across different sales channels, comparing efficiency, costs, and customer satisfaction between web, mobile, marketplace, and retail channels.
error_messages: Invalid channels: Use combinations of [web, mobile, marketplace, retail]
Minimum channel requirement: At least 2 channels required for comparison
Invalid comparison metrics: Use combinations of [speed, cost, accuracy, customer_satisfaction, return_rate]
Insufficient channel data: Some channels lack sufficient data for reliable comparison
usage: Select channels array with at least 2 channels, specify comparison_metrics, and optionally normalize by volume for fair comparison across channels.
